title: [Loelita's Lockpicks]
[Loelita's Outfitting]
description: Beneath an etched seaglass ceiling, a silken sea-themed tapestry hangs on one of the glazed bamboo walls.  A heavy lead glass display case and a wide knotted oak counter sit in opposite corners while a braided seagrass rug rests on a glazed bamboo floor.
